application.doc: Delete an existing API Access Control Policy

param.name: policy_name
param.doc: The name of the API Access Control Policy.

method.name: DELETE
method.id: Delete an existing API Access Control Policy
method.doc: To delete an existing API Access Control Policy with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP DELETE command on the API Access Control policy resource URI.
Note that prior to running this web service the Verify Access administrator credential must be stored using the Store the Verify Access administrator credentials web service.
Note deletion of an API Access Control Policy will result in the ACL and POP being deleted and also detached from any Verify Access object which they are attached to.
